# IOVMPageSize

**Global Variable**

The number of bytes in a virtual memory page.

## Declaration

```swift
extern uint64_t IOVMPageSize;
```

## Discussion

Use this constant in places where you want to specify the size of a virtual memory page.
title: IOVMPageSize
